column4: Can I use Ubuntu to sabotage an annoying neighbor's stereo system?
of course. You can also go to jail.
I'm almost at the point where I would take that risk.
it'd be more polite to ask them to be more considerate
what if they open the door for you stoned, spliff in hand, and threaten to attack you?
oh, and of course, turn the volume up rather than down...
there's always management and/or the cops
so are ATI and NVidia drivers...
ATI and Nvidia provide redistribution allowances in their licenses.
you think it's actually a driver bug?
no, I'm not entirely convinced it is, but I need a more current testing point.
can you send those instructions to me too, please?
thank you. I hope you'll be able to help NewbRyan to fix his sound.
I see, so in that sense, universe and multiverse are still official.
absolutely, since they're components in the official repo
are you available to have a look at a sound problem I can't crack (swanyl)
